chinese: [C, U] (pl. salmon) 鲑鱼（肉）；三文鱼（肉）；大麻哈鱼（肉）
examples: e.g. The [[salmon]] swim upstream to spawn in late summer or fall.

chinese: [C] (infml.) a close friend 密友；好友
examples: e.g. Margherita and I have been [[pals]] since we were at primary school.

chinese: (always + ad. / prep.) move very quickly and lightly, like a small animal （像小动物那样）轻快地跑
examples: e.g. Shaking the snow off their hair and coats, the girls [[skittered]] up the stairs into the house.

chinese: [C] (esp. AmE) a wide main road that joins one town to another 公路
examples: e.g. The interstate [[highways]] are usually faster, but smaller roads can be more scenic (景色优美的).

chinese: (BrE wind-up) (only before noun) relating to a machine or toy that you turn part of several times, in order to make it move or start working （机器或玩具）装有发条的，用手柄操作的
examples: e.g. Directly in front of him were two [[windup]] monkeys, one with a guitar and the other with a drum.

chinese: (of liquid or small bits) quickly scatter through the air （液体或碎屑）飞溅，飞散
examples: e.g. The water [[sprayed]] from the hose (水龙带) and onto the grassland.；e.g. Someone had [[sprayed]] blue paint all over his car.

chinese: force liquid out of a container so that it comes out in a stream of very small drops and covers an area 喷；喷洒
examples: e.g. The water [[sprayed]] from the hose (水龙带) and onto the grassland.；e.g. Someone had [[sprayed]] blue paint all over his car.

chinese: (always + ad. / prep.) fall or drop heavily 沉重地落下
examples: e.g. I finally got home and [[flopped]] down on the bed.

chinese: concerning or produced by magnetism 磁的；磁性的
examples: e.g. Pigeons navigate less accurately when the Earth's [[magnetic]] field is disturbed.

chinese: (fml.) used when mentioning a fact that you wish was not true 不幸地（表示但愿并非如此）
examples: e.g. Donald, [[alas]], died last winter, even though he had shown signs of recovery for a while.

chinese: [C, U] a process in which you put sth. into the group or class it belongs to 归类；分类；分级
examples: e.g. The [[classification]] of books in the library helps you find the books you want.

chinese: [C, U] (pl. rainbow trout or rainbow trouts) 虹鳟
in a very beautiful and delicate way 精美地；精致地
examples: e.g. She could not take her eyes away from the [[exquisitely]] charming portrait.

chinese: covered with rocks or made of rock 岩石覆盖的；由岩石形成的
examples: e.g. The small village sits on a [[rocky]] hill overlooking the sea.

chinese: [U] 奥米伽3（一组多元不饱和脂肪酸）
[C] a food that is needed and used all the time 基本食物；主食
examples: e.g. The aid workers are distributing corn, milk, vegetables, and other [[staples]].

chinese: produce eggs in large quantities at the same time （鱼或蛙）大量产卵
examples: e.g. The salmon swim upstream to [[spawn]] in late summer or fall.；e.g. New technology has [[spawned]] new business opportunities.

chinese: make a series of things happen or start to exist 使大量出现；使大量生产；酿成
examples: e.g. The salmon swim upstream to [[spawn]] in late summer or fall.；e.g. New technology has [[spawned]] new business opportunities.

chinese: [C, U] (pl. cod) 鳕鱼（肉）
(of a plan or action) have the opposite effect to the one you intended （计划或行动）发生意外，产生事与愿违的结果
examples: e.g. The company's new policy [[backfired]] when a number of employees threatened to quit.

chinese: (only before noun) in the sea or on the land near the coast 近海的；沿海的；海岸的
examples: e.g. This kind of fish is found worldwide in tropical oceans, at the edge of [[coastal]] waters and in the open sea.

chinese: become very strong and healthy or very successful 茁壮成长；兴旺；欣欣向荣
examples: e.g. It is still unclear whether these companies will continue to [[thrive]] in the future.

chinese: [U, sing] a large quantity of sth. 充裕；丰富
examples: e.g. One quality that the team possessed in [[abundance]] was fighting spirit.

chinese: [C] sth. that improves your life, helps you in some way, or makes you happy 幸事；幸运；福气
examples: e.g. This modern medical equipment allows patients to live a more normal life, which is a real [[blessing]].

chinese: [C]（餐厅的）用餐者
[U] the state of containing a lot of fat 富含脂肪
examples: e.g. With much protein but little [[fattiness]], beef is the healthy food sought by many people.

chinese: slightly wet, esp. in a way that is pleasant or suitable 潮湿的；湿润的
examples: e.g. This fruit cake will keep [[moist]] for several days if it is stored in the refrigerator.

chinese: cook food for too long 将（食物）煮得过熟
examples: e.g. A customer complained that the vegetables were [[overcooked]].

chinese: cook sth., such as meat, in an oven or over a fire, or cook in this way 炙，烤（肉等）
examples: e.g. I personally would rather [[roast]] a chicken whole.

chinese: [C] 挪威人
[C, U] an amount of sth. that is more than what is needed or used 剩余；过剩；剩余额；多余的量
examples: e.g. This country produces more oil than it needs and sells the [[surplus]] to the rest of the world.

chinese: include sth. as part of a group, system, plan, etc. 把 （某事物）并入，包含
examples: e.g. We've [[incorporated]] many environmentally friendly features into the design of the building.

chinese: [U] （人或动物的）肉
[U] 寿司
[C] (BrE also avocado pear) (pl. avocados) 鳄梨；牛油果
[U] the activity of deciding how to advertise a product, what price to charge for it, etc., or the type of job in which you do this 促销；营销；销售
examples: e.g. The reason their cars sold so well was that they had a brilliant [[marketing]] strategy.

chinese: [C, usu. pl.] 抗生素
(overtook, overtaken) develop or increase more quickly than sb. / sth. else and become more successful, more important, or more advanced than them （发展或增长）超越，超过
examples: e.g. Television soon [[overtook]] the cinema as the most popular form of entertainment.

chinese: weak or uncertain, and likely to become worse under pressure 脆弱的
examples: e.g. This area has a range of [[fragile]] ecosystems and rare plants.

chinese: [C] 腹部；肚子
(of animals or plants) brought or kept under control or cultivation （动物或植物）驯化的
examples: e.g. A [[domesticated]] animal, accustomed to being fed by hand, may not be able to live without man.

chinese: [C] a particular type of animal that is different from others but not so different that it is another species （动物的）品种
examples: e.g. What [[breed]] of dog is that? I've never seen one like it before.；e.g. Many animals [[breed]] only at certain times of the year.

chinese: (of animals) mate in order to have babies （动物）繁殖
examples: e.g. What [[breed]] of dog is that? I've never seen one like it before.；e.g. Many animals [[breed]] only at certain times of the year.

chinese: [C] an act of driving around for enjoyment in a car, esp. one that was taken without permission and is driven in a dangerous manner 驾车兜风（尤其偷来别人汽车进行危险驾驶）
examples: e.g. A police spokesman said the incident appeared to have been a [[joyride]].

chinese: make use of a source of energy, knowledge, etc. that already exists 利用 , 发掘，开发（已有的能源、知识等）
examples: e.g. She hopes that additional sources of educational funding can be [[tapped into]] to help the poor children.

chinese: dealing only with the important subject or idea, and not including any unnecessary discussions 简明恰当的；简洁中肯的
examples: e.g. Her comments on the current issues were brief and to the point.

chinese: (fml.) mostly 基本上；在很大程度上
examples: e.g. Their success was due [[in large part]] to their ability to speak Spanish.

chinese: be suitable for being used in a particular way 适用于某事物
examples: e.g. None of his books really [[lends itself to]] being made into a film.

chinese: save time, money, or energy by doing things quickly and not as carefully as you should （为了节约时间、金钱或精力而）马虎从事
examples: e.g. There's a temptation to [[cut corners]] when you're pushed for time, but it's not worth it.

chinese: gradually stop using or providing sth. 逐步停止使用（提供）
examples: e.g. It is highly probable that the subsidy for car manufactures is to be [[phased out]] next year.

chinese: (spoken) said when giving your opinion 依我看；在我看来
examples: e.g. Well, [[in my book]], if you steal, you deserve to get caught.

chinese: (Global Positioning System) 全球（卫星）定位系统
育空河（北美洲主要河流之一，流经加拿大和美国）
(Hudson River) 哈得孙河（主要位于美国纽约州内）
/meɪn/
examples: 缅因州（位于美国东北部）

chinese: 斯堪的纳维亚（欧洲西北部文化区，包括挪威、瑞典和丹麦，有时也包括冰岛、芬兰和法罗群岛）
皮吉特湾（位于美国华盛顿州）
